meanings.definition: Unable to be expressed in words
meanings.sent1: The ineffability beauty of the sunset left us speechless.
meanings.sent2: Her ineffability joy was evident in her radiant smile.
meanings.sent3: The ineffability mystery of the old house made us curious to explore.
meanings.sent4: The ineffability nature of love is like trying to catch a fleeting breeze.
meanings.sent5: The ineffability charm of the small town captivated all who visited.

meanings.definition: Beyond the ability to be described or understood
meanings.sent1: The ineffability complexity of the universe is mind-boggling.
meanings.sent2: The ineffability concept of infinity can be hard to grasp.
meanings.sent3: The ineffability silence of the library was almost eerie.
meanings.sent4: The ineffability depth of her emotions was like an ocean without end.
meanings.sent5: The ineffability vastness of the desert stretched out before us.
